## Context

---

## Architecture Review Criteria

### **1. Meta Tags Completeness**

**Required Meta Tags:**
- ‚úÖ `<meta charset="UTF-8">`
- ‚úÖ `<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">`
- ‚úÖ `<meta name="description" content="...">`
- ‚úÖ Open Graph tags (`og:title`, `og:description`, `og:image`, `og:url`)
- ‚úÖ Twitter Card tags (`twitter:card`, `twitter:title`, `twitter:description`)

**Review Focus:**
- Validate all required meta tags present
- Check meta tag content quality
- Verify Open Graph/Twitter Card completeness
- Assess meta tag formatting

---

### **2. Schema.org JSON-LD Structure Validation**

**Required Schema.org Elements:**
- ‚úÖ `@context`: "https://schema.org"
- ‚úÖ `@type`: Appropriate type (Organization, WebSite, etc.)
- ‚úÖ Required properties for selected type
- ‚úÖ Valid JSON-LD structure
- ‚úÖ Proper escaping and formatting

**Review Focus:**
- Validate Schema.org JSON-LD structure
- Check required properties present
- Verify JSON-LD syntax correctness
- Assess Schema.org type appropriateness

---

### **3. WordPress Integration Patterns**

**Integration Requirements:**
- ‚úÖ WordPress hooks (`add_action('wp_head', ...)`)
- ‚úÖ ABSPATH security check (`if (!defined('ABSPATH')) exit;`)
- ‚úÖ Proper function naming (unique, WordPress-compatible)
- ‚úÖ No conflicts with existing WordPress functions
- ‚úÖ Proper error handling

**Review Focus:**
- Validate WordPress hook usage
- Check ABSPATH security implementation
- Verify function naming conventions
- Assess WordPress compatibility
- Review error handling

---

### **4. Code Structure and V2 Compliance**

**Code Quality Requirements:**
- ‚úÖ Clean, readable code structure
- ‚úÖ Proper PHP syntax
- ‚úÖ Code organization and formatting
- ‚úÖ Comments and documentation
- ‚úÖ V2 compliance (if applicable)

**Review Focus:**
- Validate code structure quality
- Check PHP syntax correctness
- Assess code organization
- Review documentation/comments
- Verify V2 compliance (if applicable)

---

## Review Checklist

### **Meta Tags Review:**
- [ ] Charset meta tag present
- [ ] Viewport meta tag present
- [ ] Description meta tag present and quality
- [ ] Open Graph tags complete
- [ ] Twitter Card tags complete

### **Schema.org Review:**
- [ ] @context present and correct
- [ ] @type present and appropriate
- [ ] Required properties for type present
- [ ] JSON-LD syntax valid
- [ ] Proper escaping and formatting

### **WordPress Integration Review:**
- [ ] WordPress hooks used correctly
- [ ] ABSPATH security check present
- [ ] Function naming appropriate
- [ ] No function conflicts
- [ ] Error handling present

### **Code Structure Review:**
- [ ] Code structure clean and readable
- [ ] PHP syntax correct
- [ ] Code well-organized
- [ ] Documentation/comments present
- [ ] V2 compliance verified (if applicable)

---

## Review Deliverables

### **Architecture Review Document:**
- Meta tags completeness assessment
- Schema.org JSON-LD validation results
- WordPress integration pattern review
- Code structure quality assessment
- Recommendations for improvements (if needed)
- Approval status for deployment

### **Review Status:**
- ‚úÖ Review criteria defined
- ‚úÖ Review checklist prepared
- ‚è≥ Waiting for SEO PHP files location/access
